name: Block Builder AR - Simulation
description:
Blocky Craft AR is a FREE 3D block crafting game with full augmented reality (AR) support suitable for the full family. Build beautiful block worlds in an exciting new way as you take crafting to a new level!.

► Create EPIC Worlds including, Villages, Farms, Castles and Mansions!
► CRAFT your favourite pixelated video game characters and levels!
► Choose from over 50 hand crafted blocks in a wide range of colors and textures to perfect your designs!

Let your imagination run wild and craft amazing worlds now!

How To Play:
Aim your smartphone at a flat surface to generate a Block Craft world
Select your favourite blocks from a huge collection of colors and textures
Point the crosshair at a block and simply click add to start building!
Hit new world to generate an even more epic blocky world

Features:
Over 50 handcrafted blocks to choose from!
UNLIMITED world generation, Create new worlds or search for the craziest seed
Amazing (AR) Augmented Reality support

Camera permissions are required in order to build worlds. Please make sure this is enabled when you launch the app.

Your smartphone device must support AR technology in order to play.
